entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@charliekirk11 This is your daily reminder that Benghazi has been investigated for 5 years and no wrong doing happened.

NOW lets talk about 120k dead from Covid-19 and no masks being required at Trumps KKK rally today 

And he wants to stay in the White House?

WE WON'T let that Happen!

RT
